dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
[cid:image001.png@01CC34BF.DE2D9970]
CAPS International
122 E. Poplar Avenue, Coeur d'Alene, ID 83814
Telephone:  (208)292-1010   Fax:  (208)292-1015
June 27, 2011


VIA ELECTRONIC AND FACSIMILE TRANSMISSION


Picasa/Google
removals@google.com<mailto:removals@google.com>
Attn: Google Legal Support, Picasa Web Albums DMCA Complaints
Fax: (650) 963-3255

Re:         Unauthorized use of the CAPS International Members' Trademarks

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter is sent regarding the unauthorized use of the trademarks of The Collegiate Licensing Company, Major League Baseball Properties, Inc., NBA Properties, Inc., NFL Properties LLC and NHL Enterprises, L.P. ("CAPS International Members") by the Picasaweb account holder Nhl0594.  Nhl0594 is manufacturing, selling and/or offering for sale unauthorized jerseys bearing the Marks of one or more of the CAPS International Members in violation of state and federal laws.  In addition, Nhl0594 is using their account on Picasa to advertise, sell and distribute these unauthorized items.

Below please find the exact URL for Nhl0594's Picasa gallery, which appears to be comprised completely of unauthorized images bearing the Marks of the CAPS International Members:
https://picasaweb.google.com/nhl0594

Based on the above, we request that you permanently disable Nhl0594's account with Picasa.  Additionally, please contact our office within five (5) days of receipt of this letter to confirm that the appropriate action has been taken.  For your reference, your office has my signature on file.

Very truly yours,
/s/ Kari Gondry

cc:                  CAPS International Members
